amendment.description: To implement the recommendation of the Carter-Baker Commission on Federal Election Reform to protect and secure the franchise of all United States citizens from ballots being cast illegally by non-United States citizens.

action.text: Amendment SA 4085 proposed by Senator McConnell.
Motion to table amendment SA 4085 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 143.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4085.
Amendment SA 4085 ruled non-germane by the chair.
